HotelElement.Name: Baan Namping Riverside Village Chiang Mai

Address.Address1: MOO 7, CHONLAPRATARN RD, T. KUAMUNG, A. SARAPHI 59/1-4

Description.Text: The Baan Nam Ping Riverside Village is perfectly situated on the Ping River only 18 minutes drive from the airport and the city center, a comfortable drive or taxi ride into a rural setting. The resort springs from a personal favor of Natural shade, birds singing, river flowing, morning fog, moonlight on the river, and star-filled skies. Heliconia, ginger, dalaa and several kinds of bananas thrive in the presence of the happy, relaxed guests. All of Baan Nam Ping's bungalows are facing the river Ping. Large windows let you enjoy the view from your bed or from the attached spacious deck outside your bedroom. Closing your eyes on a fresh comfortable bed, listening to the sounds of tropical birds, or taking a massage, in your room or outside, together with tea or coffee in the presence of the river is relaxation. Your bungalow is well ventilated, and privacy enhanced by a natural fence of Heliconia and ginger separating you from your neighbor. Walking the grounds and gardens, you will always be in the shade of a tree. You will be as happy as your staff, with the design, house care, decor, gardens, menu and all services. A real treasure you will find. The ideal riverfront retreat offering a wonderful variety of activities: kayaking, biking, hiking, motor biking, night safari, market street, and a full menu of tours are available at this resort. Arrange it on request. Do all the organizing for you. Speaking, Thai, English and German. Parking facilities - at cost. Hotel also provide some more amenities like dry cleaning and a reception.

The Baan Nam Ping Riverside Village is perfectly situated on the Ping River only 18 minutes drive from the airport and the city center, a comfortable drive or taxi ride into a rural setting. The resort springs from a personal favor of Natural shade, birds singing, river flowing.

Standard - Standard offers one double bed or two twin beds with air conditioning, color TV, en-suite / private bathroom, hairdryer, internet access, laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, shaver in bathroom and ceiling fan. Standard with outdoor bathroom. One of the standard room, is a small bungalow with an Outdoor-bathroom. Take a bath under the open sky, a whole new experience. Equipped with single or double beds, air conditioning, ceiling fan, TV, shower / WC, without its own terrace.
Superior Bungalow - Superior Bungalow offers one double bed or two twin beds with air conditioning, color TV, en-suite / private bathroom, hairdryer, internet access, laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, shaver in bathroom and ceiling fan. Equipped with single or double beds, shower / WC, as well as small space as Kitchenette, Terrace with River View. Free WIFI in the room.
Deluxe Bungalow - Deluxe Bungalow offers one double bed or two twin beds with air conditioning, color TV, en-suite / private bathroom, hairdryer, internet access, laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, shaver in bathroom and ceiling fan. Equipped with double bed, shower + bath / WC, Satellite TV, Safe-box, Free WIFI in the room.
Family Bungalow - Family Bungalow offers one double bed with air conditioning, color TV, en-suite / private bathroom, hairdryer, internet access, laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, shaver in bathroom and ceiling fan. Equipped with double bed and second bedroom with mattress, air conditioning, ceiling fan, Minibar, TV, Outdoor shower / WC, Terrace with River View, The ideal cottage for families with up to 2 children, Free WIFI in the room.
